Posts.EditableText:
I am creating a mockup Pokémon game called "Pokémon Lamp". I am putting 3 starters into it, but I don't know which Gen starters to implement. Which starters should I put in?
Gen 1?(Charmander, Bulbasaur, Squirtle)
Gen 2?(Cyndiquill ,Chikorita, Totodile)
Gen 3?( Torchic ,Treecko, Mudkip)
Gen 4?(Chimchar, Turtwig,Piplup)
Gen 5?(Tepig,Snivy,Oshawatt)
Gen 6? (Fennekin, Chespin, Froakie)
Posts.HTML:
I am creating a mockup Pokémon game called "Pokémon Lamp". I am putting 3 starters into it, but I don't know which Gen starters to implement. Which starters should I put in?
Gen 1?(Charmander, Bulbasaur, Squirtle)
Gen 2?(Cyndiquill ,Chikorita, Totodile)
